# init(checkpoint:)

**Initializer**

Creates a style transfer model from a training session checkpoint.

## Declaration

```swift
init(checkpoint: MLCheckpoint) throws
```

## Parameters

- **checkpoint**: A checkpoint from a style transfer training session.

## Discussion

You can only use a checkpoint from a style transfer model’s training session if its [doc://com.apple.createml/documentation/CreateML/MLCheckpoint/phase] property is [doc://com.apple.createml/documentation/CreateML/MLPhase/training].
